Q_DESC: The tower of hanoi is a mathematical puzzle. It consists of three rods, and a number of disks of different sizes which can slide onto any rod. The puzzle starts with the disks in a neat stack in ascending order of size on one rod, the smallest at the top. We have to obtain the same stack on the third rod.
TESTCASE_1:
2
1 2
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
enter the number of disks

Tower1-> 1	2

Tower3-> 


Tower1-> 2	
Tower2-> 
Tower3-> 1	


Tower1-> 
Tower2-> 2	
Tower3-> 1	


Tower1-> 
Tower2-> 1	2	
Tower3->
